text: The Dying Swan () is a 1917 Russian silent drama movie directed by Yevgeni Bauer.Умирающий лебедь It stars Vera Karalli, Aleksandr Kheruvimov, and Vitold Polonsky. == Actors == * Vera Karalli as Gizella – Gizella – mute dancer * Aleksandr Kheruvimov as Gizella's Father * Vitold Polonsky as Viktor Krasovsky * Andrej Gromov as Valeriy Glinskiy – the artist * Ivane Perestiani as Glinskiy's friend == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Russian drama movies Category:Russian silent movies Category:1917 drama movies Category:Movies directed by Yevgeni Bauer
title: The Dying Swan (movie)
